liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

outputMsg.label: Output message
outputMsg.tooltip: Message to display when successfully given points. use '$user', '$points','$currency' as replacements

useRewardCost.label: Use reward cost
useRewardCost.tooltip:
True - use same cost as Twitch channel point reward cost.
(1 channel point = 1 bot currency)
False - use custom amount reward

defaultRewardCost.label: Custom amount reward
defaultRewardCost.tooltip: Specify the amount of channel currency to be awarded.

minDiff.label: Lower difference
minDiff.tooltip:
Difference UNDER the standard amount.
Lower bound = Standard amount - lower difference

maxDiff.label: Upper difference
maxDiff.tooltip:
Difference OVER the standard amount.
Upper bound = Standard amount + upper difference
